Pre-Game Insights: Team India must win the 4th T20I match against West Indies to stay in the series.
Captain Hardik Pandya might make a key change in the playing XI for the 4th T20I.
Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill are expected to continue as the opening pair despite their low scores in the previous match.
Sanju Samson might play as the wicketkeeper in the 4th T20I.
Suryakumar Yadav and Tilak Varma are likely to be included in the playing XI due to their current form.
There might be changes in the fast bowling order, with Umran Malik potentially replacing Mukesh Kumar.
